text: Hi there! I am new to HubSpot. I develop a map with tabs and panels on react and now I get asked to bring those components to a website created on HubSpot. I cannot integrate my react components to HubSpot. I tried to follow the get started repo and the youtube video but any luck so far. Someone here that had already done this and can help me ? . Inside my react app I am using material ui, framer motion, maplibre-gl, react-map-gl, axios, and other libraries. Can I get all the code into HubSpot ? or I am not able to do that ?

Hey <@U077K3S44KY>, basically you can only use HubSpot components for React Cards, you can open a different page in a modal but that might not be what you're looking for. Here's the breakdown for all of the limitations at the moment: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview#limitations>
